Author: 246tnt
Content: @Leo Moser (mole99) I updated the patch on the issue. Here's also a copy.

Author: 246tnt
Content: The previous one had a logic error because I added the diode area to gate area too early. First need to check if there is _any_ gate area else you end up testing wires that are only connected to diodes ...

Author: 246tnt
Content: It wasn't a huge deal on Tholin design because the MF multiplier is so big for 5V devices. But if you have any 3v3 devices, then the 3v3 rule are run and you get false positives.

Author: mole99
Content: Thanks Sylvain! I'll update the template branch shortly.
